Noun: one of a series of ridges that moves across the surface of a liquid (especially across a large body of wate)
a movement like that of a sudden occurrence or increase in a specified phenomenon
the act of signaling by a movement of the hand
a hairdo that creates undulations in the hair
a persistent and widespread unusual weather condition (especially of unusual temperature)
a member of the women's reserve of the United States Navy; originally organized during World War II but now no longer a separate branch
Verb: signal with the hands or nod
move or swing back and forth
move in a wavy pattern or with a rising and falling motion
twist or roll into coils or ringlets
